title: Jonathan Garner: 4 Concerns to Watch on Asia & EM Equities
description: As the year began, there was a high degree of optimism that 2021 could be a great year for Asia & EM equities. But instead, Asian equities have lagged the U.S. and Europe. So what went wrong?
itunes:title: Jonathan Garner: 4 Concerns to Watch on Asia & EM Equities
itunes:summary: As the year began, there was a high degree of optimism that 2021 could be a great year for Asia & EM equities.  But instead, Asian equities have lagged the U.S. and Europe. So what went wrong?
